DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect Low level laser therapy stability displacement orthodontic miniscrew implant use two different force application protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Low-level Laser Therapy Stability Displacement Orthodontic Miniscrew Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate effect Low level laser therapy ( LLLT ) stability displacement orthodontic miniscrew implant mediate immediate force application . They assess 48 miniscrew implant place patient orthodontic treatment postgraduate clinical Orthodontics , School Dentistry Ribeirão Preto , University São Paulo . They randomly divide 4 group : 1- LLLT immediate force application ; 2- LLLT force application 4 week implantation ; 3- immediate force application without LLLT 4- force application 4 week implantation without LLLT . Orthodontic force 150 gF apply 3 month . A low power laser device Therapy XT wavelength 650 nm output 100 mW immediately implantation ( energy density : 2J/cm2 ) , 808 nm 100 mW ( energy density : 4J/cm2 ) , every 48 hour two week follow application use . The stability assess use Resonance Frequency Analysis ( RFA ) three time : implantation day ( T1 ) , one month ( T2 ) 3 month force application ( T3 ) . Stability measure evaluate Implant Stability Quotient ( ISQ ) . To assess amount miniscrew implant displacement , use Cone Beam Computed Tomography ( CBCT ) beginning ( CT1 ) final application orthodontic force ( CT2 ) . Three-dimensional model create specific program superimpositions CT1 CT2 use measure distance millimeter inicial final position . The evaluation carry three point : head miniscrew implant ( point C ) , thread ( point R ) apex miniscrew implant ( point A ) . The result statistically analyze accord nature data significance level adopt 5 % .
DOC.criteria: Patient permanent teeth . Use miniscrews orthodontic planning . Miniscrews place labial upper low posterior region . Patient agree participate ( Informed consent ) Patient systemic disease . Patient periodontal disease and/or inadequate oral hygiene . Use drug chronically . Patients consume alcohol tobacco . Use fix palatal lingual orthodontic device .
